Here is a short example to guide you step by step through the mosaic generating process with the functions [`arosics()`](https://hugolblc.github.io/managecrownsdata/reference/arosics.html) and [`Time_SIFT()`](https://hugolblc.github.io/managecrownsdata/reference/Time_SIFT.html) 

First you will need to download the test data [here](https://filesender.renater.fr/?s=download&token=4aaa362c-5f9e-4f58-93f9-b4f995cbfcba)
